lines.text: Now listen here, teddy bear. Four weeks ago, you were a cute, available, old-fashioned guy who liked horse riding. In a month you got married, you had two daughters and you can't ride a horse to save your life!

[to Teddy]
Should we break the ice here or in bed?
While Deedee was waiting for me in San Francisco, Charlotte was waiting in Los Angeles. Two women waiting for me in the middle of the night. Crazy as it seems, I had adventure in my life.
Do you believe this man asking whether my Theresa would fool around?
I find it hard to imagine your wife sleeping with YOU.
What was I thinking. I have kids, a wife and a good marriage. And to think I could have wrecked it and for what?
[looking over at the ground from a towering height and about to jump off]
Take a look at those legs. Say she is kind of cute though. Ok knock it off! I learned my lesson and I will never do it again.
[contemplating while falling down a building noticing a good- looking blonde woman]

[referring to Teddy's friend, Joe, who has been cheating on his wife]
Do you know what he did to Theresa, right in front of me?
He had his secretary call him and tell him he had work to do at the office.

[laughing nervously, knowing he's about to pull the same trick]
You mean that old trick still works?

[shaking her head in disbelief]
Not anymore!
[Didi takes a gun out of her dresser drawer. It goes off accidentally in the process, making for an understandably panicked Teddy]
Do you realize you could have shot me?
I would never do that... not without good reason!
